title: New: Kailee Morgue – Unfortunate Soul
body:
**Kailee Morgue** just ‘gets’ pop music.

Her debut four track EP features some of the most hooky, radio ready tracks I’ve heard for a long time. Latest single, _Unfortunate Soul_, follows on from where Medusa and Discovery left off; super slick, chorus heavy and primed to reach an ever expanding fan base. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Kailee Morgue just ‘gets’ pop music. Her debut four track EP features some of the most hooky, radio ready tracks I’ve heard for a long time. Latest single, Unfortunate Soul, follows on from where Medusa and Discovery left off; super slick, chorus heavy and primed to reach an ever expanding fan base. Check it out below.
